metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins and skills

plugins.name: mcp-apps
plugins.description: Skills for building and migrating MCP Apps with interactive UIs

plugins.name: plugin-toolkit
plugins.description: Tools for analyzing, polishing, and managing Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: web-tdd
plugins.description: TDD workflow for web applications with Vitest, Playwright, and Vibium

plugins.name: dimensional-modeling
plugins.description: Kimball-style dimensional modeling patterns for DuckDB star schemas in agent systems

plugins.name: tui-design
plugins.description: Design functional, readable terminal UIs with proper visual hierarchy, semantic color, and responsive layout
